name: Pesto Piccante Provolone Panini
author: Dietz & Watson
summary: Aged to perfection, our piccante provolone kicks this classic Italian sandwich up a notch. Paired with pesto, it makes the perfect panini and will quickly become a family favorite.
ingredients: 3 thin slices  Dietz & Watson Provolone Cheese
directions: Cut the ciabatta roll into two slices and spread butter across each side
Toast in a skillet over medium-high heat
Top each slice of bread with the prepared pesto sauce, slices of Dietz & Watson Provolone, tomato, and artichokes
Place in the skillet or in a panini press for 2 to 3 minutes, gently pressing the slices together
